en.title: Share OneClaw with friends
en.subtitle: Copy this text and share it with your friends or group chats. The creator will really appreciate it ğŸ˜˜
en.body:
I recently found a one-click installer for OpenClaw called OneClaw
You can get it installed and start using it in just a few minutes

People say OpenClaw can do these things:
â€¢ Browser automation: auto search and browsing, scheduled information capture, and summary processing
â€¢ Content creation: copywriting and AI image generation
â€¢ Data processing: Excel data handling and chart creation
â€¢ Office automation: batch email processing, resume screening, and form filling
â€¢ Meeting assistant: pre-meeting file prep and PPT creation, plus fast post-meeting minutes

If you want low-cost automation for content, operations, office work, and recruiting, try: oneclaw.cn
The creator also set up a feedback group, so you can report any issues there
